experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis treatment with fenclorim or 4-chloro-6-methyl-2-phenylpyrimidine

description.text: Wild type Arabidopsis thaliana Col-0 root cultures, were treated with fenclorim or 4-chloro-6-methyl-2-phenylpyrimidine dissolved in acetone to achieve a final concentration of 100uM. The final acetone concentration of 0.1% was replicated in control root cultures. Samples were taken at four and twenty-four hours post addition in biological triplicate. Root cultures were routinely maintained at 25C in the dark. 18 samples were used in this experiment

bibliography.authors: Skipsey M, Knight KM, Brazier-Hicks M, Dixon DP, Steel PG, Edwards R.
bibliography.title: Xenobiotic responsiveness of Arabidopsis thaliana to a chemical series derived from a herbicide safener.
